text: Daniel Anthony James (born August 10, 1937 – July 4, 1987) was a professional American football offensive lineman for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 1960 to 1966. He played college football at Ohio State University. Dan attended Elder High School and the Center was drafted with the eight pick in the first round of the 1959 NFL Draft by the San Francisco 49ers. He eventually played with the Pittsburgh Steelers and retired in the late 1960s. He then returned home to Cincinnati with his wife and children. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1937 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Ohio State Buckeyes football players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Place of death missing category:Elder High School alumni
title: Dan James
